title: Bathukamma Festival
description: We celebrated the grand festival of Bathukamma with traditional songs, dance, and vibrant floral arrangements. It was a joyous gathering of the community.

title: GTA 100 Cricket 2025
description: The 2025 GTA Cricket Tournament was a huge success, bringing together cricket enthusiasts from all over Michigan. Teams competed with great spirit, making it a memorable sporting event for the community.

title: Palle Vanta
description: A fun-filled day where families came together for games, delicious food, and networking in the beautiful summer weather.

title: Bathukamma Festival 2024
description: A vibrant celebration of the Festival of Flowers, bringing together the community for an evening of traditional songs, dance, and devotion.

title: GTA 100 Cricket 2024
description: The 2024 Cricket Tournament set the stage for our sporting traditions. It was a thrilling series of matches that strengthened the bonds within our community through the love of the game.
